name: Print Voxels!
description:
Hello everyone!!!

We are happy to publish our first indie game! 🚀🚀🚀

Print Voxels! is a relaxing 3D printing casual game. You just get your own 3D printer for free. Print whatever you want!

Be careful though, it requires attention. Don't make mistakes, and get the maximum score to gain stars 🌟. Try if you can make it :)

===============================================================

Features:

- Single-player 

- Many levels to complete

- Learn the rules of 3D printing

===============================================================

Controls:

- Level selection, printing - mouse selection

- To print use the buttons in front of the 3D printer

- Hold them to print faster  🏎️

===============================================================

We're looking forward to your feedback. If you want to get another build (Windows,  iOS, Android, macOS) just write to us - we'll send it to you.

Don't miss the news about further projects and  join us on our social media channels

- Discord - https://discord.gg/6ufHxruKee

- Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrACyzQiTc9Ymr14pzl1djQ

- Twitter - https://twitter.com/vizaxis_games

- Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/printvoxels/

Good luck and have fun! :)
